name: 2048 Balls
description:
You control SphereGlow, Who wants to get the 2048 Ball.

How does he do this, By merging balls with smaller numbers.

It's a race against time to Merge balls with the same number to make the 2048 Ball. 10 Minutes to be exact.

So merge balls, of the same number, and have fun.

Controls:

WASD Or Arrow keys to move.

Space Bar or LMB to dash.

Thanks for playing my game.
